text:
Mr, Ms.
My name is Alex Dupont and I would like to apply for a job at the Hellfest. As
far as I can remember I have always been interesting in this event because
organise one of the most famous festival in the world is complicated, difficult
and a stressful moment but for me it is also and beautiful experience which can
allow me to gain in maturity and to gain experience in the working work.
Furthermore, my dream is to work and to be an important element in the
Hellfest team.
I like to think of myself as an independent and determined young woman,
motivated, helpful and flexible. However, I can also be strict and I am not
scared to say what I think.
I am doing a licence in information and communication so I can help the community
manager or anyone in fact because I am motivated to do what occasion is
presented to me.
I am asking for a scholarship because it would be a great achievement to
work in a festival that I have admired since my childhood. In addition to that,
it would improve my curriculum to have that type of experience in it. I am
thrilled by this experience and I would be so grateful if you allow me to
realise it.
Contrary to the common opinion, the Hellfest is not a simple hard rock
and metal festival. It is also a place where no one is judge and a place of
artistic expression; in the case of work of art as much as in the case of
clothes. I would like to promote the event because it happens only three days
in a year but it is a special event which bring so much people from all around
the world. I know that some people would disapprove me in such world but I am
ready and impatient to show to this people that I can do it and I will do it.
Nevertheless, money is the element which step me away from this dream
and this is why I need that scholarship.
Thank you for your time.
In the waiting of your response.
Best regards.
